title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: The stake was sold for $676 million in May 2003. On September 9, 1997, Milchan signed a 15-year distribution pact with 20th Century Fox worldwide in all media with the exception of foreign television rights, ending the previous association with Warner Bros. (1991–1999).

title: Regency Enterprises | Corus Entertainment Fandom | Fandom
snippet: This company produced films such as Once Upon a Time in America and Q&A. This company was shut down in 1991. Arnon Milchan rebranded Regency International Pictures and renamed it to Regency Enterprises.
